metadata.dc:author: Marco, E
Ibáñez, A
Cabezas, A
Gabriel Martínez, J
Marín, F
Quiles, J A
Sogorb, F
metadata.dc:description: We present an 18 year-old man with chylopericardium after acute pericarditis with severe pericardial effusion and cardiac tamponade secondary to Mycoplasma pneumoniae infection. We review the etiology, diagnostic procedures and therapeutic possibilities for chylopericardium.
metadata.dc:title: Quilopericardio tras pericarditis aguda.
[Chylopericardium after acute pericarditis].
